faqs.a: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. It simplifies the API lifecycle, allowing you to send requests, create documentation, and set up automated testing.
It's built for developers, QA engineers, and product managers. Basically, anyone who interacts with APIs.

faqs.q: Do you have a free trial?
faqs.a: Yes, Postman offers a forever-free plan for up to 3 users. You can also try the Professional plan features with a trial.

faqs.q: Can I collaborate with my team?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Our Workspaces allow real-time collaboration, commenting, and version control for your API collections.
